name: mjrevel
comment: I enjoyed the eyebrows immensely on Fluffykin's. If not for those -1 to entire score. The game needs more eyebrows. Thanks!

name: pancakecity
comment: Such lovely detail! I loved seeing the mistakes come out of the machines. I like the cat's character design, too.

name: Cambrian_Man
comment: Very nice aesthetic. Eventually, I just stopped worrying about trying to sort things and ran around with a can of spam watching his eyebrows wiggle.

name: delfino
comment: Fun, it gets crazy trying to keep up. Sometimes the controls seems to be a bit touchy but fun overall. Looks great too

name: awppy
comment: Does a great job at showing how to play within the game itself thanks to the clean, simple visuals, and the theme is cute. The multiple control schemes is a nice addition, but none of them work quite perfectly and that adds to the already-stressful gameplay.

name: Lizzip
comment: Strange idea (not in a bad way!) and I liked the visuals. Extremely difficult though! A difficulty select would be a nice addition.

name: Kino333
comment: I love it, and not just becuase its cats! :3 Twas a lot of fun and was really fricken difficult.
